definition: powerless to defend oneself (idiom); helpless
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
difficult (to...)/problem/difficulty/difficult/not good
disaster/distress/to scold
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
like a clay Bodhisattva fording a river, can't guarantee his own safety/unable to save oneself, let alone others
pinyin: ni2 pu2 sa4 guo4 jiang1 , zi4 shen1 nan2 bao3

sentences.english: He is now like a clay Buddha fording the river, hardly able to save himself.
sentences.chinese: 他现在也是泥菩萨过河自身难保了。

sentences.english: He could not keep himself safe like mud bodhisattva pass river.
sentences.chinese: 他本人是泥菩萨过河，自身难保。

sentences.english: Okay, so I'm endangering myself so that this evil principle can die?
sentences.chinese: 我自身难保了，这条烂规定可以废止吗？

sentences.english: whereas governments would let some banks fail.
America's richer trading partners are struggling too.
sentences.chinese: 美国富有的贸易伙伴此刻也是自身难保。

sentences.english: The governor, meanwhile, was all but trapped.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，这位省长自身难保。

definition: like a clay Bodhisattva fording a river, can't guarantee his own safety/unable to save oneself, let alone others
pinyin: ni2 pu2 sa4 guo4 jiang1 , zi4 shen1 nan2 bao3

to sit and watch, but remain indifferent (idiom)
not to get involved/to stay out of it
in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
to throw stones at sb who fell down a well (idiom); to hit a person who is down
if you ride a tiger, it's hard to get off (idiom); fig. impossible to stop halfway
to be at death's door (idiom)
precarious as pile of eggs (idiom); ready to fall and break at any moment/in a dangerous state
as matters stand/things having reached this stage
at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state/imminent crisis/living from hand to mouth
to offend sb/to give offense/to displease
lit. the path exhausted, the end of the road (idiom); an impasse/in a plight with no way out/things have reached a dead end
cannot maintain (sth)/unable to keep/more likely than not/may well
It's hard to clap with only one hand./It takes two to tango/It's difficult to achieve anything without support.
to be facing imminent calamity (idiom)/disaster is looming
